name: Happy Cat
description:
This game was the result of the 50 games in 1 day challenge I did.
Watch the video were I talk about the creation of it:
https://youtu.be/hpngQOA0E1w

As the time was rather limited there are some bug.
I am glad for any new ideas and feedback given.
